document.heading: Special Education Quality Improvement Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-196, the “Special Education Quality Improvement Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-725. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 7, 2014 and Oct. 28, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Nov. 18, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-488 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-196 became effective on Mar. 10, 2015.
